新研究揭示了影响健康成年人类固醇激素水平的因素根据刚刚在领先的国际科学杂志上发表的新研究，健康成年人的类固醇激素水平受口服避孕药和吸烟以及其他生活方式的选择以及生物性别和年龄等因素（例如生物性别和年龄）的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/new-research-reveals-factors-influencing-steroid-hormone-levels-steroid-hormone-levels-inhealthy-dults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/new-research-reveals-factors-influencing-steroid-hormone-hormone-levels-inthealthy-aplults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80A0B5D0BCBF-40F3-8041-E4F865C81AB8 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 22:49:59 -0400 New research reveals factors influencing steroid hormone levels in healthy adults
